title: Optimize genome sequence assembly parameters
author: Shaun Jackman
date: 2016-10-17
---

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Read the data
```{r read-data}
data <- read_tsv("results/iterations.tsv") %>%
	mutate(Best_N50 = cummax(N50))
```

# N50 vs k
```{r plot-N50-vs-k}
ggplot(data) +
	aes(x = k, y = N50, label = Iteration) +
	geom_point() +
	geom_line() +
	geom_text_repel()
```

# Best N50 vs Iteration
```{r plot-N50-vs-iteration}
ggplot(data) +
	aes(x = Iteration, y = N50, label = k) +
	geom_point() +
	geom_text_repel() +
	geom_line(aes(y = Best_N50))
```
